short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Downloads all available photos from kidplan

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Downloads all photos you have access to from Kidplan.
Log into your Kidplan account and click the Kidplan downloader icon to start the download.
Photos will be downloaded to a folder named kidplan_downloads with subfolders for each album. Make sure you don't have "Ask where to save" enabled.
